address: 2130 The Alameda, Suite 310, San Jose, CA 95126
subHeading: Legal Counsel Handling All Aspects of Intellectual Property Law
valueProp: The Law Offices of Dorian Cartwright provides expert legal counsel in all aspects of intellectual property law, ensuring that creative work is protected and clients can benefit from their creations.

testimonalData.text: Dorian provided exceptional legal support for our patent application. Highly recommended!
testimonalData.author: John Smith

testimonalData.text: The team at Dorian Cartwright's office is professional and efficient. They helped us protect our trademarks effectively.
testimonalData.author: Emily Johnson

testimonalData.text: I am grateful for the copyright advice I received from Dorian Cartwright. Their expertise is unmatched.
testimonalData.author: Michael Brown
